name: horen-monorepo
description: horen is a Music Player powered by Electron and React
author: Kevin Jobs

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='horen:*' concurrently "pnpm dev --filter renderer" "pnpm dev --filter main"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG='horen:*' concurrently "pnpm build --filter renderer" "pnpm build --filter main"
